languages.text: "Твои блюстители плохо справляются с порядком на нижних палубах. Из-за них я подхватил{mf||а} какую-то сыпь".
languages.translation_comment: если на игроке висит бафф LT_Contaminated_buff
если на игроке висит бафф LT_Contaminated_buff

languages.text: "Your enforcers are doing a rather poor job of keeping order on the lower decks. I caught some kind of rash because of them."
languages.original_text: "Твои блюстители плохо справляются с порядком на нижних палубах. Из-за них я подхватил{mf||а} какую-то сыпь".

traits.locale_text: "Your enforcers do a rather poor job of keeping order on the lower decks. I caught some kind of rash because of them."
"Your enforcers do a rather poor job of keeping order on the lower decks. I caught some kind of rash because of them."
"Your enforcers are doing a rather poor job of keeping order on the lower decks. I caught some kind of rash because of them."

"Your enforcers are doing a rather poor job of keeping order on the lower decks. I caught some kind of rash because of them."
"Your enforcers are doing a rather poor job of keeping order on the lower decks. I caught some kind of rash because of them."

languages.text: « Vos prévôts semblent avoir le plus grand mal à faire régner l'ordre sur les ponts inférieurs. À cause de leur incompétence, j'ai attrapé une sorte d'eczéma. »
languages.original_text: "Your enforcers are doing a rather poor job of keeping order on the lower decks. I caught some kind of rash because of them."

traits.locale_text: « Vos prévôts semblent avoir le plus grand mal à faire régner l'ordre sur les ponts inférieurs. À cause de leur incompétence, j'ai attrapé une sorte d'eczéma. »

languages.text: «Su personal de seguridad no está manteniendo el orden en las cubiertas inferiores. Por su culpa, me ha salido una especie de sarpullido».
languages.original_text: "Your enforcers are doing a rather poor job of keeping order on the lower decks. I caught some kind of rash because of them."

traits.locale_text: «Su personal de seguridad no está manteniendo el orden en las cubiertas inferiores. Por su culpa, me ha salido una especie de sarpullido».

languages.text: “你的执法者对底层甲板的维护工作做得相当差劲，都是因为这些废物，我身上才起了疹子。”
languages.original_text: "Your enforcers are doing a rather poor job of keeping order on the lower decks. I caught some kind of rash because of them."

traits.locale_text: “你的执法者对底层甲板的维护工作做得相当差劲，都是因为这些废物，我身上才起了疹子。”

languages.text: 「お前たちの執行官は、下層デッキの秩序を保つのにかなり粗末な仕事をしている。彼らのせいで、発疹のような病気にかかったよ」
languages.original_text: "Your enforcers are doing a rather poor job of keeping order on the lower decks. I caught some kind of rash because of them."

traits.locale_text: 「お前たちの執行官は、下層デッキの秩序を保つのにかなり粗末な仕事をしている。彼らのせいで、発疹のような病気にかかったよ」

languages.text: "Eure Enforcers bekommen es nicht sonderlich gut hin, auf den Unterdecks die Ordnung zu wahren. Ihretwegen habe ich mir einen unschönen Ausschlag eingefangen."
languages.original_text: "Your enforcers are doing a rather poor job of keeping order on the lower decks. I caught some kind of rash because of them."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Enforcers bekommen es nicht sonderlich gut hin, auf den Unterdecks die Ordnung zu wahren. Ihretwegen habe ich mir einen unschönen Ausschlag eingefangen."

languages.text: "İnfazcıların, alt güvertelerde düzeni sağlamak konusunda hiç iyi iş çıkarmıyor. Onlar yüzünden bana bir çeşit isilik bulaştı."
languages.original_text: "Your enforcers are doing a rather poor job of keeping order on the lower decks. I caught some kind of rash because of them."
